rule_description: MAC should be in XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX format only
Station type should not be Numeric
Should be in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format only
Alarm notification type should not be more than 1 character

condition: AND CAST(DATE_TIME_NOTIF AS TIMESTAMP) IS NOT NULL
rule_description: Alarm notification datetime should not be NULL
Short name of designation should not be more than 12 characters
